Package main.java.warzone.entities

Class GameSession

java.lang.Object
main.java.warzone.entities.GameSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameSession extends Object implements Serializable
Concrete class to access and manage the parts of game session.
Version:
3.0.0

    • createContinent

      public void createContinent(String p_ContinentName, String p_ContinentControlValue) throws WarzoneValidationException
      Creates a new continent.
      Parameters:
      p_ContinentName - Name of the continent.
      p_ContinentControlValue - Control value (ID) of the continent.
      Throws:
      WarzoneValidationException - If the provided continent ID format is invalid or if the continent already exists.

    • deleteContinent

      public void deleteContinent(String p_ContinentName) throws WarzoneValidationException
      Deletes a continent from the game session.
      Parameters:
      p_ContinentName - Name of the continent.
      Throws:
      WarzoneValidationException - If the continent doesn't exist.

    • createCountry

      public void createCountry(String p_CountryName, String p_continentName) throws WarzoneValidationException
      Creates a new country in a specific continent.
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the country.
      p_continentName - Name of the continent the country belongs to.
      Throws:
      WarzoneValidationException - If the continent doesn't exist or the country already exists.

    • createCountry

      public void createCountry(String p_CountryName, String p_continentName, Long p_CountryId) throws WarzoneValidationException
      Creates a new country in a specific continent with a specific ID.
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the country.
      p_continentName - Name of the continent the country belongs to.
      p_CountryId - ID for the new country.
      Throws:
      WarzoneValidationException - If the continent doesn't exist or the country already exists.

    • makeNeighbors

      public void makeNeighbors(String p_CountryName, String p_NeighborCountryName) throws WarzoneValidationException
      Makes two countries neighbors.
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the first country.
      p_NeighborCountryName - Name of the second country.
      Throws:
      WarzoneValidationException - If either country doesn't exist.

    • removeNeighbors

      public void removeNeighbors(String p_CountryName, String p_NeighborCountryName) throws WarzoneValidationException
      Removes the neighbor relationship between two countries.
      Parameters:
      p_CountryName - Name of the first country.
      p_NeighborCountryName - Name of the second country.
      Throws:
      WarzoneValidationException - If the countries aren't neighbors or don't exist.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:
